CodeList.Name: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire for COPD Patients Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire for COPD Patients test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I get afraid or panic when I cannot catch my breath.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Afraid or Panic When Cannot Catch Breath

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot do household chores.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Do Household Chores

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out for entertainment or recreation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Go Out for Entertainment

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out of the house to do the shopping.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Cannot Move Far From My Bed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Cannot Move Far From My Bed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot move far from my bed or chair.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Move Far From Bed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot play sports or do other physical activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Play Sports

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I cannot take a bath or shower, or I take a long time to do it.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Cannot Take a Bath or Shower

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: My cough or breathing is embarrassing in public.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Cough Is Embarrassing in Public

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: My coughing or breathing disturbs my sleep.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Coughing Disturbs My Sleep

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: Coughing hurts.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Coughing Hurts

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: Coughing makes me tired.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Coughing Makes Me Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Please check one box to show how you describe your current health.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Description of Your Current Health

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How would you describe your respiratory problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Description of Your Respiratory Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as carry heavy loads, dig in the garden or shovel snow, jog or walk briskly (5 miles per hour), play tennis or swim.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Difficult to Carry Heavy Loads

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as walk up hills, carry things up stairs, light gardening such as weeding, dance, bowl or play golf.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Difficult to Walk Up Hills

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: Everything seems too much of an effort.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Everything Seems Too Much Effort

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: Exercise is not safe for me.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Exercise Is Not Safe for Me

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I have become frail or an invalid because of my respiratory problems.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Become Frail Because of Respiratory Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I get exhausted easily.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Get Exhausted Easily

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How many respiratory attacks did you have during the last year?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Number of Respiratory Attacks Last Year

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-How Often Do You Have Good Days
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-How Often Do You Have Good Days
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How often do you have good days (with few respiratory problems)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Good Days with Few Respiratory Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How do your respiratory problems affect you?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - How Respiratory Problems Affect You

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I bring up phlegm (sputum).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Bring Up Phlegm

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I cough.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Cough

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I have attacks of wheezing.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Have Attacks of Wheezing

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I have shortness of breath.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Have Shortness of Breath

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I hurry or walk fast, I have to stop or slow down.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - If Walk Fast Have to Stop

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: Jobs such as household chores take a long time, or I have to stop to rest.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Jobs Take a Long Time

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Not in Control of Resp Problems
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Not in Control of Resp Problems
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I feel that I am not in control of my respiratory problems.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Not in Control of Respiratory Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: My respiratory problems are a nuisance to my family, friends or neighbours.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems a Nuisance to Family, Friends or Neighbours

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Short of Breath When Bend Over
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Short of Breath When Bend Over
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I am short of breath when I bend over.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Short of Breath When Bend Over

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I am short of breath when I talk.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Short of Breath When Talk

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Take a Long Time to Get Washed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Take a Long Time to Get Washed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I take a long time to get washed or dressed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Take a Long Time to Get Washed or Dressed

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Walk Slow Than Others My Age
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Walk Slow Than Others My Age
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I walk slower than other people my age, or I stop to rest.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Walk Slower Than Other People My Age

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I walk up one flight of stairs, I have to go slowly or stop.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking around the house.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Around the House

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking outside on level ground.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Outside on Level Ground

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQC1-Walking Up a Flight of Stairs
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQC1-Walking Up a Flight of Stairs
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking up a flight of stairs.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Up a Flight of Stairs

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking up hills.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Up Hills

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Washing or dressing yourself.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Washing or Dressing Yourself

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - If you wheeze, is it worse when you get up in the morning?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Wheezing Worse In the Morning

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire for COPD Patients Questionnaire Test Name
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ-C Test Name Terminology
